LanguageData.Lian_Paper.label: Paper of Lotus
LanguageData.Lian_Paper.description: Cults carry identity tokens that can be exchanged directly for silver.
LanguageData.Tang_JadeCard.label: JadeCard
LanguageData.Tang_JadeCard.description: The jade card that the Tang Dynasty sergeant carries with him, has the auspicious pattern on it, is quite valuable.
